desc: Bauerfeind has developed the best sports braces, supports and compression products to keep you in the game and improve your performance. True gradient compression helps improve circulation to boost oxygenating blood flow and remove inflammation. Find the brace that fits you & experience the Bauerfeind difference!

layout.text: 30 day money back guarantee if our products have quality problems (Subject to relevant terms and conditions) ! Plus for a limited time only, receive 15% OFF for sign up for our newsletter.
